sentences.en: He watched the cup teeter on the edge before it fell.
sentences.cn: 他眼看着茶杯在边上摇摇欲坠，然后掉落。

sentences.en: Hyde shifted his weight and felt himself teeter forward, beginning to overbalance.
sentences.cn: 海德转移了一下重心，就感到自己往前倾，开始失去平衡。

sentences.en: Normal leaf spring suspensions would teeter back and forth, causing an insecure feeling for the driver.
sentences.cn: 师范板簧悬架将蒂特来回, 造成一种不安全的感觉司机.

sentences.en: Seagulls teeter on the parapet in front of her, boats go by.
sentences.cn: 海鸥在她面前的护墙上摇摇摆摆地走着, 船只从她身边驶过.

sentences.en: She teetered along in her high-heeled shoes.
sentences.cn: 她穿着高跟鞋踉踉跄跄地走着。

sentences.en: Teeter - totter caught up bein a father and a prima donna.
sentences.cn: 当爸和挣钱回家不知顾哪头才好.

sentences.en: The performance of teeter board was very wonderful, and drew rounds of applause.
sentences.cn: 晃板的演出很精彩, 引来人们阵阵的鼓掌.

words.tran_cn: 摇晃；玩跷跷板；步履蹒跚；摇摇欲坠

phrases.tran_cn: 处于困境（或危难）的边缘

trans.tran_cn: 摇晃，蹒跚，上下动，前后动，犹豫不决，使…上下晃动
trans.tran_en: to stand or walk moving from side to side, as if you are going to fall
